TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含用于跟踪和管理相关控件组的 控件的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to track and manage related groups of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是通常所使用的控件的只读集合并控件来管理一组控件。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by and controls to manage sets of controls. 一个控件使用保持所有的列表对象控件在页上，而控件使用对象跟踪，它包含的控件。A control uses a object to keep a list of all the controls on a page, whereas a control uses a object to track the controls that it contains. > [!NOTE] > 集合中包含这两控件和位于其他服务器控件 （如用户控件、 自定义控件和 ASP.NET 控件）区域中并用作 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。The collection contains both controls and other server controls (such as user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls) that are placed in zones and used as part of Web Parts applications. 因此，举例来说，如果有区域在页中，并在其中声明了自定义控件和 ASP.NET控件，这两个控件将采用引用集合属性。So, for example, if you have a zone in a page, and within it you declare a custom control and the ASP.NET control, both controls will be in the collection referenced by the property. 对象存在，以便 Web 部件控件集可以使用强类型集合。The object exists so that the Web Parts control set can work with strongly typed collections. 同样，如果你想要执行大量操作的一组控件，可以获取对的引用对象使用属性。Similarly, if you want to perform mass operations on a set of controls, you can get a reference to a object using the property. 例如，你可能想要遍历所有页面上的控件和更改它们以某种方式的外观。For example, you might want to loop through all the controls on a page and change their appearance in some way. 即使对象是只读的您可以以编程方式更改到基础控件集合中引用的属性。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将Web 部件页上的对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the object on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 在分部类页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含的控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一部分包含在一个分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意，`Button1_Click`方法创建包含的所有对象中引用的控件属性，其中包括所有页上的控件。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 该方法循环访问所有控件，并切换每个控件的属性，用于确定该控件是否为正常或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是包含的控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，中声明的控件`WebPartZone1`是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，而是因为它们将作为包装控件在运行时，和类继承自类，控件的自动视为控件在运行时间，因此它们包含在对象。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器，并单击页加载之后**切换 ChromeState**按钮，在该分部类代码会遍历对象或者最小化控件或将它们返回正常状态。After you load the page in a browser and click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重复单击**切换 BulletedList1 标题**按钮时，最上方的控件的标题更改为备用值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

summary.span: 初始化 类的空的新实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的空实例类。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 对象本身是只读的没有方法来添加单个控件添加到它; 因此，您将拥有很少想到去使用此构造函数。The object itself is read-only and has no method to add individual controls to it; therefore, you will have little occasion to use this constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合来初始化 对象的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a object by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的实例通过传入的集合类控件。The constructor initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of controls. 尽管对象是只读的并且没有向其添加各个控件未设置方法，可以创建你自己的控件集合，并将其传递给构造函数。Although a object is read-only and there is no method for adding individual controls to it, you can create your own collection of controls, and pass that to the constructor. 这使您可以创建自定义集合和大容量对其执行操作。This enables you to create custom collections and perform bulk operations on them. 您还可以访问集合中的基础控件并以编程方式更改其属性值。You can also access the underlying controls in the collection and change their property values programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将Web 部件页中的构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 在分部类页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含的控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一部分包含在一个分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意，`Button1_Click`方法创建包含的所有对象中引用的控件属性，其中包括所有页上的控件。Note that the `Button1_Click` method creates a object that consists of all the controls referenced in the property, which includes all the controls on the page. 该方法循环访问所有控件，并切换每个控件的属性，用于确定该控件是否为正常或最小化。The method iterates through all the controls, and toggles each control's property, which determines whether that control is normal or minimized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是包含的控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，中声明的控件`WebPartZone1`是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，而是因为它们将作为包装控件在运行时，和类继承自类，控件的自动视为控件在运行时间，因此它们包含在对象。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls are automatically treated as controls at run time and therefore are included in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击**切换 ChromeState**按钮，并请注意，分部类中的代码循环访问对象或者最小化控件或将它们返回正常状态。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle ChromeState** button, and notice that the code in the partial class loops through the object and alternately minimizes the controls or returns them to normal. 或者，如果您重复单击**切换 BulletedList1 标题**按钮时，最上方的控件的标题更改为备用值。Or, if you repeatedly click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, the title of the uppermost control is changed to alternate values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够检查特定对象，并确定它是否属于对象。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is part of a object.

param.name: array
param.span: 对象的数组，用于包含复制的集合。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法时，你想要组合可以包含一个自定义数组中的控件对象，这些控件的子集或超集的这些控件。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls.

Public Function IndexOf (value As WebPart) As Integer

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数，指示集合中特定对象的位置。

span.span: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有多个方法非常有用控件上，Web 部件页，并且需要了解相对于其他控件的序号位置。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one control relative to the others.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 根据位置或唯一标识符返回集合中的特定成员。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As WebPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定的 控件的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 基于集合中的位置返回集合的成员。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中指定索引处的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引器，可访问基础中的控件对象的索引，并更改其属性值或调用方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将Web 部件页上的索引器。The following code example demonstrates the use of the indexer on a Web Parts page. 此示例包含三个部分：This example has three parts: - 在分部类页的代码。The code for the page in a partial class. - 包含的控件的网页。The Web page that contains the controls. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一部分包含在一个分部类中页的代码。The first part of the code example contains the code for the page in a partial class. 请注意，`Button2_Click`方法创建一个空对象，则将向其分配控件从`WebPartZone1.WebParts`属性。Note that the `Button2_Click` method creates an empty object, then assigns to it the controls from the `WebPartZone1.WebParts` property. 方法通过使用其索引访问集合中的第一个控件，并切换其属性值。The method accesses the first control in the collection by using its index, and toggles its property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollection.vb#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是包含的控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls. 请注意，中声明的控件`WebPartZone1`是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，而是因为它们将作为包装控件在运行时，和类继承自类，控件可将其视为控件在运行的时并使其属于对象。Notice that the controls declared in `WebPartZone1` are standard ASP.NET server controls, but because they are wrapped as controls at run time, and the class inherits from the class, the controls can be treated as controls at run time and made part of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/CS/webpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartCollection_Overview/VB/webpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击**切换 BulletedList1 标题**按钮，并注意代码在两个可用的标题选项之间控件的标题。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Toggle BulletedList1 Title** button, and notice that the code toggles the title of the control between the two available title choices.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(id As String) As WebPart

param.name: id
param.span: 集合中特定 控件的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for a particular control in a collection.

summary.span: 基于唯一字符串标识符返回集合的成员。

span.span: Returns a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.

value.span: 集合中 ID 等于 的值的第一个 。

span.span: The first in the collection whose ID equals the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引器，您可以访问控制中根据唯一标识符的对象。The indexer enables you to access a control in a object according to a unique identifier. > [!NOTE] > Web 部件控件集执行不区分大小写进行匹配此属性，以便区分大小写不是唯一的一部分`id`值。The Web Parts control set performs case-insensitive matching on this property, so case sensitivity is not part of a unique `id` value. 属性还可用于标识的成员中某些特定情况下的对象。The property also works to identify members of a object in some specialized cases. 情况下控件，索引器能以匹配由包装的基础的子控件的标识符控件。In the case of controls, the indexer is able to match the identifier for the underlying child control wrapped by the control. 情况下索引器与基于不区分大小写的比较结果的控件的标识符匹配的控件，`id`参数并或属性值。In the case of controls, the indexer matches the identifier for the control based on a case-insensitive comparison of the `id` parameter and either the or property values.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Pages
